title: Chicken and Watermelon
itunes:title: Chicken and Watermelon
description:
Today on the show we opened the phone lines to see if our listeners get offended over certain stereotypes after a company put out a menu for their customers featuring fried chicken and watermelon. In fact Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the company and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
